basics.name: Joey Liu
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A results-oriented developer who has an obsession with code quality and a strong sense of ownership.

highlights: Broadcasted a dozen of front end related talks regarding internal website best practices
Led and launched multiple internal websites and expand them to 23 different regions
Achieved full CI/CD by setting up website black-box tests and canaries with Cypress
Proactively improve customer experience by setting up client-side metrics and monitor them from CloudWatch dashboards
Demonstrated JSON auto form concept with a POC which saved hundreds of development hours
Drastically improved customer experience by combining multiple web apps into a single page application
Solved front end cache inconsistency permanently through CloudFront integration
Participated and won AWS hackathon 3 years in a row
Brainstormed and delivered Access Control List (ACL) system which supports privilege customization for pages/features/commands
Deployed an internal app written in Node.JS which provides seamless collaboration between developers and QAs
Optimizing SQL query to reduce the loading time for serval pages by up to 80%
Reduced the loading speed of all dashboard pages from 8 to 1 seconds while implementing responsive design for friendly UX
Solved complex technical issues on production environment by setting up screen sharing sessions with customers
Hired/mentored junior developers and provided guidance through code review while constantly assigning tasks to them
Achieved 3 times faster application loading speed by centralizing WCF services with LINQ classes.
Responsible for the design and development of the scheduling module using Telerik RadScheduler.
Reduced the loading time for batch print forms by 70% through redesigning the print form module
Created windows form app for search & replace complex patterns in files as well as database update.
Ramp-up efficiently and able to produce production-ready code in a timely manner
Implemented numerous enhancements and provided creative UX design for multiple projects.
Maintained highly distributed Rails web applications for several high performances, high traffic live sites
Collaborated with PM and UX designer regarding product definition, schedule, scope, and project-related decisions.

awards.title: AWS Marketplace Operation Wizard
awards.summary: Implemented award-winning hackathon chatbot project powered by Amazon Lex

awards.title: AWS Safty Infrastructure 2020 Hackathon Winner
awards.summary: Delivered neuro-linguistic programming project for automatic sensitive data detection

awards.title: AWS Safty Infrastructure 2021 Hackathon Winner
awards.summary: Design and implemented multi-layer comment feature with rating system within two days
